data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Hanover, Jamaica and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hanover, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Hanover, Jamaica be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Hanover, Jamaica.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hanover, Jamaica so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sandy Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sandy Bay, Hanover, Jamaica.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 21,598 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Hanover, Jamaica to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Hanover, Jamaica.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Hanover
location.cities_list: Lucea, Sandy Bay, Cascade, Mt Peto
location.cities_list_w_pop: Lucea (6,289), Sandy Bay (4,520), Cascade (1,232), Mt Peto
